Does the Illuminati/Satan's Secret Society use Saturday morning cartoons to teach children witchcraft/Demonology?
Does the Illuminati/Satan's Secret Society use Saturday morning cartoons to teach children witchcraft/Demonology?
Does the Illuminati with its many branches such as the "Free" Masons & Associates, Mafia & Associates, & New Age movement and associated witchcraft cults use Cartoons to influence and teach children how to perform witchcraft and practice demonology?
Does this evil Satanic Mafia use cartoons as well as many other methods to place little children in spiritual bondage?
Saturday morning on channel 12 I witnessed a cartoon teaching children how to go though initiations to reach higher levels of witchcraft and that in so doing they would receive spirit guides / demons whom they called ferries that would assist them. Satan's children are very brave aren't they!
Kevin Trudeau says he has a Gene who grants his wishes. How many initiations / ceremonies do you think he went through before he received a demonic entity powerful enough to manipulate humanity in this manner? Is this Power of positive thinking or the power of demonic manifestation? Did Kevin run into members of AMWAY also? I always wondered why AMWAY is set up in a pyramid system. The Illuminati 666 reaches far and wide!
Have you been taken captive by Satan and his Secret society Revelation 13, 10? all you have to do is participate in said occult practices and or "Games" witch, get it, the Illuminati has placed into society to take people into spiritual bondage to witchcraft / demonic forces and that through said spiritual bondage people / victims are being forced to go through secret initiations preformed through methods of spiritism / witchcraft / altered states of consciousness / Transcendental Meditation / demonism and are being forced to accept the worship of the New World Orders many demons one including but not limited to Satan himself.
Is the Mark of the Beast a SPIRITUAL MARK?
Is the MARK OF THE BEAST acquired after going through the NWO's secret ceremony performed through Transcendental meditation assisted with witchcraft?
Is this the method for the unholy baptism / spiritual bondage, and the lowering of the all Seeing Eye on humanity / the pyramid?
Did the NWO give you your keys to get into one of the dungeons of damnation / horn sign?
Did you get your spiritual stamp and one way ticket to horror and pain for eternity?
Satan's "Secret" Society is handing them out for "FREE". In fact they insist that you receive it, other wise they will torture you with witchcraft. If that doesn't work, they will use their members in the Judicial, Executive, and Legislative branches of government to try and intimidate and control you. If that isn't enough they have set up secret, shhhhh, members up in management positions in large and small corporations to intimidate and control you through threats of termination and homelessness. This satanic mafia isn't above the law they are a law all unto themselves!!! HILE HITLER!!!!! or do they say HALE SATAN!!!!!!
